alert.note: Alert for Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Crook County through 430 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of New Haven, or 39 miles northwest of Sundance, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Crook County to the north of Hulett and New Haven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
